attributes.action: Send ULEZ scrappage vehicles to Ukraine
attributes.background:
The expansion of the London Mayor's ultra low emission zone (ULEZ) on August 29th is leading to thousands of vehicles being scrapped, many functional, in exchange for a subsidy payment. 

We demand that suitable vehicles from the scheme be sent to Ukraine!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the ULEZ car and motorcycle scrappage scheme are a matter for the Mayor of London, rather than a decision about policy or legislation that is made by the Government or Parliament.

You could petition the London Assembly:
https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
